Posts.Content: A friend of mine also had recurrence in the exact same places as your mom. She's 41. The doctor said she could have 2-5 years. Of course, everyone is different. Ask your doctor to level with you. You can also look up studies on metastatic breast cancer, though any time you start reading the studies be prepared to be depressed. I do know of one person who has had mets for 25 years. It comes back, she gets tx, it goes away, and so on.
Posts.Title: survival rate on met?
